transcript: All is one, this time release instinctual firecracker went off, and they all turned and formed a line as long as the California coast and started swimming. And they're swimming right now, is it? That's all that matters.

segments.text: All is one, this time release instinctual firecracker went off, and they all turned and formed
a line as long as the California coast and started swimming.
And they're swimming right now, is it?

metadata.transcript_ground_truth: all as one, this time release instinctual little firecracker went off and they all turned and formed a line as long as the California coast and started swimming.  And they're swimming right now as if that's all that matters.
